constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 106 (Thursday, June 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BUTTERFIELD:
H.R. 3979.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article I, Section 8, Clause 3 of the Constitution,
Congress has the power to collect taxes and expend funds to
provide for the general welfare of the United States.
Congress may also make laws that are necessary and proper for
carrying into execution their powers enumerated under Article
I.
[Page H2929]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.

title: Protecting Natural Gas Consumers from Overcharges Act of 2021
